channel.title: Denis Shovlin on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: People-led Policy Panel
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm DH - Deirdre Henderson DS - Denis Shovlin You’re listening to Iriss.fm, Scotland’s social services podcast. On 7th February 2019 Deirdre Henderson, People-led Policy Officer at Inclusion Scotland, and Denis Shovlin, a member of the People-led Policy Panel, spoke to Michelle from Iriss about the setup, aims and ambitions of the People-led Policy Panel, a group of people who are working together to reform adult social care in Scotland.
